name: Aire 360 Ceramic Air Styler Blowout Kit
about: What it is:This set includes an Aire 360 with ceramic attachments to style bouncy blowouts and lasting curls with nothing but air..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Curl-Enhancing.Key Benefits:- T3 Aire 360 Technology features improved airflow to wrap hair effortlessly and deliver fast, easy blowout curls with zero heat damage*.What Else You Need to Know:Discover air styling's newest breakthrough. T3 Aire 360 pairs advanced heat and airflow with ceramic attachments to style bouncy blowouts and lasting curls with nothing but air..This Set Contains:.Research Results:Based on a third-party study in which a tensile strength test showed no mechanical damage to the hair when using the T3 Aire 360 curling attachments set on the highest temperature and highest velocity on hair in both a dry state and a 20% wet state:
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.How to style with curling attachments: .-Rough dry until hair is slightly damp, then divide into sections..-Connect your preferred attachment to curl in either direction..-Hold the middle of 1u20132 section of hair, letting the ends hang. .-Bring the curling barrel about an inch behind the section. The tool will automatically grip the ends of the section and wind hair up across the barrel. .-Hold until section is dry, then activate the Cool Shot. Hold for 5u201310 seconds, then power off the tool and release the curl...How to style with the oval brush: .-Rough dry until hair is slightly damp..-Connect the Oval Brush attachment and divide hair into 3u20134 sections..-Sleek blowouts: Place brush at the roots and brush down through the ends. .-Voluminous blowouts: Place brush under hair at the roots and roll out towards the ends. .-Bends and waves: Place the brush under the ends of the section, rotate inward or outward, and hold for 2u20133 seconds..-Finish with the Cool Shot to lock in your look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this! However the curls did not stay long enough to do the other side of my head. The curls did not hold for even five minutes. This could be user error, but I did notice the cool shot never got cool. I may have received a faulty tool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is probably user error but I bought this because I am not great at doing my hair. A curling iron hates to see me coming. That being said, I bought this because I wanted something easy to use and so far it's not BAD but I'm still figuring out how to use the curling attachments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive this after I had been researching for months. Unboxed and used for probably 5 minutes, and it turned off and will not turn back on. Instead I have two blinking flashing lights, and there is absolutely no explanation in the user manual about what those lights mean. Never thought I would have to put a warranty claim in after having something for less than an houru2026beyond frustrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this with my own money with a discount and rewards money which brought it down to $180.  honestly i think thats how much these attachment dryers are worth now that everyone has this tech.  Iu2019ve had the Dyson in the past and prefer this model to that one. The curling barrels are longer (slightly skinnier) and easier to use. The paddle brush that comes with this one is a great size and achieves a nice volume and style with minimal effort.    Someone mentioned the power unit isnu2019t as strong which is true but despite this Iu2019m still able to style in the same amount of time the Dyson took. I think less power - along with the ceramic coating - helps to minimize frizz and certainly means less heat on your neck as youu2019re styling so I appreciate that feature. My curls will last for 2-3 days but I think thatu2019s more down to my hair type and not the tool.  Overall if youu2019re looking to buy an attachment dryer styler this is a great option. But wait for a good sale before you spend all that money!

reviews.review_title: Broke right after warranty, barely used.
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t normally leave reviews, but this needs to be said. The brush doesnu2019t work as well as my Revlon brush which Iu2019ve had for +5 years. It takes longer to dry and goes frizzy quite fast. Unfortunately, I was travelling abroad while I was using my brush and I wasnu2019t able to apply for a 1 year warranty on T3 website. The problem is that I canu2019t switch out any other brush heads now that the attachment button is broken. It looks like the glue that attach the button into the main handle lost its adhesion fell out and is now in inoperable. Iu2019m very disappointed because this brush was very expensive and I wonu2019t be able to apply for the warranty or refund it through Sephora because of their return policy. The brush broke one day after the Sephora return period. Iu2019d accept at least an exchange but the customer service does not permit this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to leave this review to help people who were trying to decide between this, the Shark Flexstyle and Dyson Airwap. I have owned the Shark, and used my friends Dyson multiple times.   Pros of T3: - slightly longer barrels  - chic design, colour and comes with easy to transport leather-look bag - easy to use (they all are really once you get the hang of the technique) - curls hold for a long time even with fine hair - smooth barrels minimise risk of frizz  Cons: - Dryer not has powerful as the Shark or Dyson  Overall I am really happy with my purchase and glad I sold my Shark to a friend! Whilst I liked the Shark, sometimes felt the very matte barrels could cause hair to frizz, however the Shark is a great price and has a powerful dryer which does not have to be removed which is a plus!  I can't comment on the brushes as I have fine hair, and find them too big to be of use to me.

The handle is very big and heavy. This just seems like a copy of all the other air stylers on the market with the curling attachment. The curling attachment does not work well. There are dead air spots that does not hold the hair and the curls do not last. As soon as my hair falls off the barrel the curls fall out. Compared to competitors, the curling attachment is the worst. Pricey for what you get - a white labelled product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Im a hairstylist and was literally obsessed with this the first time i tried it! Even just using the rough dry attachment was so good! Rough drying my hair with a hair dryer leaves my hair a little crazy and tangly and feeling a little rough and with the aire 360 it felt so smooth and so shiny! I swear I took my hair dryer out of my bathroom cabinet after I got done using this! And the sound compared to a hair dryer! Im recommending this to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The blow dryer attachment is super quick and allows for an effective dry without the frizz. This brush is such a must have! I absolutely love this device.There are attachments that allow for the curl to go in both directions and it allows you to get the perfect blow out every time. it comes with a cute pink carrying case for all of the attachments and device. The pink color is absolutely stunning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s my first time owning a The T3 Aire 360 ceramic air styler and was a bit disappointed . I tried this styler on my wavy thin hair, my sisteru2019s curly thin hair, and my momu2019s curly thick hair. Iu2019ve tried all of the attachments and my favorite one is the curling ones although the curls donu2019t last long they leave a cute look. The curls dropped in seconds of being curly. I played around with the settings trying to find the right one for each hair and to this day the curls donu2019t last. One last thing I could try is putting some hair spray or mousse to see if they last longer like the description states. The brush pulled my hair soo many times so make sure to not let your hair get to were the attachment connects because it will pull your hair. Overall I would definitely try something else from this brand to see if this was just a miss for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very curly hair and I blow dry my hair to help when I braid my hair. I received this blow dryer and I love that it comes with so many attachments for different reasons. I used the brush attachment and it curled my hair so well! I would recommend to all hair types because it can be used in many ways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: literally my holy grail, this has been in my hands every day for the perfect hair look! i am a beginner but this is super easy to use and works wonders on my long thick hair. i have gotten so many compliments and it has increased my confidence. def recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this new Aire 360! It is an amazing combo tool and not only saves so much space in my bathroom cupboard but also leaves my shoulder length hair looking smooth and voluminous. Even with shorter hair Iu2019ve been able to use this to save time with my hair in the morning and I love how easily the attachments can be added / removed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Aire 360 with ceramic attachments is my new favorite hair tool! It provides fantastic blowouts and long-lasting curls using just air to wrap my hair.  This doesnu2019t heat damage my hair and it appears smoother and shinier as well. The price point is great as well and this is worth the purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, this thing is so pretty. I love the color and the way it looks. The attachments are super easy to switch out, the bag holds everything nicely, and it has great setting options for heat. I will say there is a bit of a learning curve if you are used to the traditional curling irons/blow out tools. It took me a bit to get used to but I do like it. The curls were pretty and it has my hair feeling so light and shiny. I love the blowout option as well. I got lots of compliments after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this air styler! Itu2019s very easy to use and switch out the pieces. It also creates amazing bouncy curls every time, and the curls last for hours. I also noticed that I donu2019t get any heat damage when using this styler. Loving it so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted so bad to love this product.  The packaging is 5 stars. I have fine straight hair and no matter what I tried, I couldnu2019t get it to curl. It did leave my hair smooth and shiny but not worth it for the price.  Hair Deidre

reviews.review_title: SOLID DUPE FOR THE DYSON AIRWRAP
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Solid dupe for the dyson airwrap. It comes with less attachments but these are the ones I mainly use anyways. Obsessed with the pink color. Love that the brush is larger than competitors since I have thick hair and it has smoothing bristles. The carry case is also more practical since itu2019s a pouch for travel The only complains I have is having to switch out the barrels for left and right. The material itu2019s made of also gets hot so you have to be careful not to touch the barrels or youu2019ll burn yourself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair tool is absolutely perfect! T3 is my favorite brand for hair tools and I was so excited to receive this one! Itu2019s so pretty and aesthetically pleasing. I love that it comes with a bag with multiple pockets!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. It works super well and It is a much more affordable option. The round brush is much better than any other ones I have tried and the curlers are longer which is better for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The T3 aire 360 ceramic air styler blowout kit is sooo worth it. I have very curly hair and it makes my hair so smooth and the frizz is completely gone. It makes my wash days so much easier and my hair has never looked better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite hair tool!! I own the shark flex and I love it but when I tried this, I fell in love! This is way better! Itu2019s also such a versatile tool. You can blow dry your hair, straighten with the brush, and give yourself a blow out and so much more. Get this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this blowout kit. the packaging is first a 10/10. the entire kit and all of the attachments are extremely easy to use. it gives great curls and they last all day. highly recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best air styler blower Iu2019ve ever used! Rod does get quite hot so just be careful but otherwise itu2019s perfect. Itu2019s easy to use and my hair looks so good! Highly recommended to try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So happy with this set. I love how lightweight this is and how itu2019s not overly loud. Iu2019m still not 100% sold on the curling aspect as I feel like the curls donu2019t really last for me. I think my fine, layered, curly hair needs the tension that a typical clipped iron provides. I will still use all of the attachments and definitely recommend this tool!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best hair styling tool for making my hair not only looking beautiful, perfectly styled but also prevent the hair from further damaging due to improper heating when using other styling tools. This very sleek and well functioning design hair styler is safe and easy to use with multiple interchangeable attachments from curling rods, blowout dryer to hair brushing kit. The core is rotating 360u00b0 which make it so easy to control. This T3 AIRE 360 Ceramic Air Styler Blowout Kit is a time saver for me. It helps getting my hair done in less time than I used to spend on every day, and my hair looks amazing whichever way I choose to style it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this tool! Iu2019ve been wanting a large round drying brush for a while and I love this one! It gives my fine hair body without leaving it fried like other tools Iu2019ve tried. I really like the curling attachments too, however I find you need to use very small sections or the hair wonu2019t stay wrapped around. I wish it was a bit more powerful so I could curl larger sections at a time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE. This tool is so easy to use and gave me the best at home blow out Iu2019ve ever done. I love the packaging and all the finishes make it feel super luxurious and high quality. Itu2019s easy to use and a good price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to see how sleek and beautiful this was and I turned it on and it sounded so amazing. Then I used the round brush pieceu2026.major design flaw. Hair gets stuck in the cracks and it literally rips your hair out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this dryer!! Itu2019s super easy to use and gives your hair the perfect blowout look! I will say itu2019s easier to use than other hair dryers with all the attachments and Iu2019m so glad I got it! Blowout lasts all day too- highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am literally obsessed with with this  styler. First of the color is super cute. It comes with all the tools I need.  It's very easy to use I thought it was gonna be harder but no, just watch a video on their page and I got the hang of it.  I have curly hair and this works great if I want a blowout or waves. It works super fast and the waves last until you shower. Amazing quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: THIS IS THE TOOOOOL LADIES!!!! The color is stunning. The packaging and travel case is amazing. The QUALITY is superb. It will completely transform your hair from wet to gorgeous salon blow-out in no time and it's half the price of their competitor. GET. THIS. FOR. YOURSELF!

reviews.review_title: A must have for hair styling
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: T3 Aire360 ceramic air styler blow out kit is just a wonder in a cute pink leather bag. I love how they packaged product so nicely and well in a leather bag and then in a hexagon box. It came with all attachments you will need to make beautiful blow out and perfect curls. Added attachments include oval brush, drying attachment and 2 curling attachments for right and left sides. I am a person with 0 experience using this kind of hair tool and I was able to do it easily and in a great way. 1st of all drying tool is perfect when purpose is just to dry your hair and give a blow out look. It do its function quickly and efficiently and in a mess free way. The oval brush is a Multipurpose one with which you can make sleek or voluminous blow outs as well as bends and waves perfectly. 2 curling attachments are for right and left halves of the hair with arrow marked.  There are 3 heat settings, 3 speed settings and 1 cool shot and u can choose whatever you need. Curling attachments are easy to use and have helped me curling my very very straight hair nicely and efficiently. I love this kit and would recommend everyone to have it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blowout kit is gorgeous it has a light pink and rose gold packaging at a first time user to be honest its a bit tricky at first but the more you used it you get used to it and its like easy fizzy it is ceramic that will hold your curl and turn to a nice blowout and my favorite its a long barrel perfect for a long hair like me and comes beautiful tote bag as well so love this set perfect for travel just throw on your luggage highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: his is an awesome hair styler with the air styling capabilities. I found it difficult at first to get used to the type of styling, but after a couple uses it was easy and everything looked really good. I love the curling capabilities because the air just takes the hair and I donu2019t have to hold it to the heat. Amazing tool!

This tool is my new favorite thing!! I have been wanting to try something like this for so long and I am pleasantly surprised at how much I love it! It makes curling my hair so easy and fun. A lot of people say their curls don't last with these types of things, but as long as you let your curls set before brushing them out, I haven't had any issues!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this new styler by T3 so do much! I love the ceramic barrels they give the best curls and the design is beautiful i love the color and the other attachments it comes with like the oval brush! I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick straight hair, I used it with wet hair after showering rough drying with the dryer attachment and then I used the curler attachments my hair hold up nicely with some light hold hair spray, I also tried it with damp hair. It doesnu2019t heat up a lot which is great because I donu2019t want any hair damage. Also its not as loud as other dryers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: T3 Aire 360 Ceramic Air Styler Blowout Kit left me speechless. It came in the most luxurious packaging that impressed me. It had a pink leather bag for storage with slots for each attachment. This blowout kit includes a SoftAireu00ae drying concentrator, an oval brush attachment, a 1.35u201d ceramic curling attachment (left), and a 1.35u201d ceramic curling attachment (right). Its base is light, and each attachment easily goes on and off the base. The curling attachment holds hair on its own and creates glossy curls that last throughout the day. The drying concentrator dries the hair well (I have thick hair, and it worked well).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried a tool that curls with air so I was so excited to try this. First of all, the device is GORGEOUS. Itu2019s so sleek and the light pink color is beautiful. It even comes in a beautiful bag that makes storing the pieces super easy. Itu2019s a pretty good size too- not too big. The dryer and brush function work wonderful. Give me a gorgeous at home blow out. I have thick hair and the air curler was a bit hard for me to learn but got the hang of it eventually. It makes gorgeous curls, but I wish the curls held a bit longer. I just have to quickly spray hairspray and then that helps hold it. Overall, I love this tool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing for making my straight hair curly. It is also so gentle as it just uses air and not heat to style! Definitely amazing if you have straight and flat hair like I do. An amazing gift. Love the attachments as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this styler! Itu2019s decreased my dry time significantly and creates a beautiful look every time. The styler is very luxe and high quality. I love the curler attachments and how quickly my hair dries with the dryer brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this! My new favorite tool to blow out my hair. I have 3b curly hair and I love the fact that the round brush is big, because it allows me to grip my hair so much better. The blow out look is also very long lasting which is amazing

reviews.review_title: Great set, but curls don't work for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful design and the set it self is just gorgeous. I love the fan and brush attachment, and the different settings it offers for heat and air speed. My hair is normally hard to style and for the curls to last is rare. So the curling barrels didnu2019t really work for me, but I think it has to do with my hair type. Even though I sprayed sections of hair with water mist before styling each curl, it still didnu2019t last! The curls come out beautiful right away, but by the time I finished everything just fell apart. As you can see in the photo that is like 5-10 min after styling my entire hair. I will try practicing more and see if it works, but I will continue using the fan and brush attachment because those are amazing, dries my hair quickly without burning. Absolutely love it!

reviews.review_title: Amazing hair too for my long and thick hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am beyond excited to share my latest hair tool obsession u2013 the T3 Aire 360 Ceramic Air Styler Blowout Kit. This thing has been a total game-changer for my hair routine!  One of the first things I noticed and absolutely love is the carrying case. Itu2019s got these handy pockets to keep all the pieces together and in place. For someone who tends to lose things easily (guilty!), this has been a lifesaver. Everything stays organized and ready to go whenever I need it.  Now, letu2019s talk about my hair u2013 itu2019s very long, and finding a tool that can handle it without a fuss is always a challenge. But the extra-long barrel on this air styler is perfect for creating beautiful, voluminous curls. Itu2019s designed to gather hair effortlessly with its Aire 360 Technology, and Iu2019m seeing zero heat damage, which is a huge plus.  The ceramic curling attachments are another highlight. They pair with the advanced heat and airflow to smooth my hair, boost shine, and create those lasting blowout curls we all dream of. Plus, the T3 AireX motor delivers such powerful airflow that my hair dries super quickly, preserving its natural moisture.  One of my favorite attachments is the oval brush. The SmoothGrip bristles and CeraGlossu2122 ceramic surface lift, smooth, and add incredible shine to my hair without any breakage. And with three heat settings, three speed settings, and a cool shot to lock in my style, I can customize my blowout exactly how I like it.  Styling is a breeze with the 9ft, 360-degree swivel cord u2013 no more tangling or twisting! This tool gives me salon-quality results at home, and I couldnu2019t be happier.  If you have long hair and want to achieve gorgeous, healthy curls with minimal effort, you need to try the T3 Aire 360.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: This hair tool is amazing. I have curly hair and I was able to achieve a blowout look with ease. I love love love the curl attachments itu2019s similar to other air wrap tools but a way more affordable price to get the same outcome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this! First off the color looks so luxurious and all the attachments are high quality! I find that even at the lowest setting, it dries my hair fast. The brush attachment straightens my hair. It takes some practice to get used to curling your hair but once you get the hang of it, itu2019s gonna be easier. This is so worth buying for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this blowout kit. I was worried that my hair texture was too thick for it to work, but it created the most gorgeous curls in less than 15 minutes. Iu2019m saving so much time styling my hair with this new tool, itu2019s definitely been a must have for my hair care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly super obsessed and amazed over the quality of this styler. It is very elegant luxurious and its baby pink! Love how easy i can use it and how it makes the curls shiny and beautiful. I also love the cute pouch it comes with! Very helpful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the nicest styling kit Iu2019ve ever had the pleasure of owning. The technology is innovative in a way I didnu2019t even know existed to be honest. The way the air travels through each attachment at just the right temperature to style effortlessly with minimal to no heat damage is honestly invaluable. Iu2019ve particularly been enjoying the brush attachment for sleek blowouts and the curling attachments to give my style a soft wave and accentuate the layers in my hair. I have shoulder length hair at the moment but I can see getting even more benefit out of this tool as my hair grows out. Lastly, it goes without saying that the packaging and aesthetic is impeccable. Iu2019m not sure anyone does it quite like T3 in that regard.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've had long, wavy hair for years and struggled to achieve a good blowout using a dryer, round brush, and hot tools. It took me a while to even achieve mediocre results. But since using the AIRE 360 Ceramic Air Styler Blowout Kit, styling has become effortless. It's user-friendly, requiring only one hand and is particularly easy if you're familiar with other hair tools. It makes me feel like a professional. My hairu2014and my scalp, for that matteru2014has never looked or felt better when styled by myself.  What's great about the AIRE 360 is its quick drying time. I can have dry, bouncy hair in under 15 minutes. If I'm taking more time to add curls, it might extend to 20-25 minutes. The curls it creates are beautiful and last long, even without hairspray. This tool has become a staple in my routine because I find it gentler on my hair and appreciate its versatility. I absolutely love this product and highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Aire 360 Styler by T3! Itu2019s so versatile and I can create multiple hair styles with the various attachments. The blowout curls are easy to achieve and hold up for awhile. The bag it comes in is luxurious and looks upscale for transporting the tool and attachments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the longer barrels on this air styler as well as the blowout brush attachment! I do find the airflow is a little weak and its hard to get my hair to wrap around the barrel unless I use really small sections.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loving the T3 Aire styler! I love how lightweight and quiet the drier is. I love the variety of attachments it comes with. I am really impressed with how well it dries and curls my hair. The product and packaging are beautiful. I love the light pink color. The bag to hold the tool and attachments is perfect for travel and to keep everything together. Overall, I love it am so impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this T3 Micro blowout kit! I adore this kit's color and packaging. I adore how the attachments are detachable, and it's very adorable and portable. My curls last all day, and it works amazingly well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The T3 hair tool is the best hair tools iu2019ve ever used! I have shoulder length straight fine hair and it worked so well with my hair which is usually difficult to style. The curling wand automatically wraps the hair so you dont need to hold your hair and twist- thats so convenient.  The brand has put so much thought into the storage and travel bag with a separate compartment for each attachment. This is one tool that I will always now go to while styling my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This tool is fantastic! I adore the beautiful, soft pink color. The attachments are ideal and incredibly user-friendly; the barrels create stunning curls that last all day. Plus, it's extremely lightweight, so my arm doesn't get tired while using it. It creates the easiest blowout!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used an air styler like this before, so I cannot compare it to similar products on the market. But I do know this is half the price and works very well! I have long, thick hair, so I appreciate the long curling barrels. I get tons of volume and big, bouncy curls. The only con for me is that the curls do not hold more than a day and my hair becomes more like a blowout look the next day (but still bouncy and voluminous). If you want a more structured curl look, this will not give it to you. I find that curling my hair when it is slightly damp and using the cool-shot feature really help with lasting power. I also love the tote it comes with to store all the attachments! All the details are very luxurious.

I am a newbie when it comes to using air tools for styling, and I am so impressed with the results! I have long thick hair that rarely holds a curl, but I love the loose beachy curls that the T3 Aire 360 gives me. I just finish with some hairspray and they last for hours! It also makes drying and styling so effortless. I love the vegan leather storage pouch- it makes it so easy to transport the styler and kit, and looks chic and stylish. This would make a great gift for anyone interested in getting an air styling tool. The quality is also excellent, and I'm impressed with how versatile the tool is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019d recommend this! Itu2019s a really good alternative to your traditional heat styling products. It feels a little more gentle and the styles appear softer. One thing I will say is it takes some time and practice to achieve the looks so be patient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful packaging, product color and design, and functionality. I have long curly 3a hair but love a tool that can blow dry and relax my hair quickly and efficiently. This one works. Itu2019s not too loud or difficult to hold (I have smaller hands). The temperature settings make it easy to control and my hair does not feel dry or damaged after using. Canu2019t wait to share with my friends with more straight/wavy hair as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have gotten a perfect blowout SO easily with this tool! I love that I donu2019t have to fully dry my hair before I can style it. It cuts down my styling time by so much. It was very easy to use and my hair looks amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The T3 Aire 360 Ceramic Air Styler Blowout Kit is a beautifully crafted, luxurious hair tool. It's lightweight, sleek, and simple to use. The attachments are easy to switch out and lock securely, creating gorgeous curls and a flawless blowout. The storage pouch is convenient, with pockets to keep all attachments well-organized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: by t3 I AM OBSESSED with this whole set oh my gosh! I love that itu2019s also compact and it makes perfect with the little pouch for travel! The color is gorgeous !! It reminds me of the Dyson but significantly cheaper and still works just as great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The C3 Aire 360 Hair Blowout Kit is an absolute game-changer and an amazing gift for anyone who loves their hair. The moment I laid eyes on it, I was captivated by its stunning, super classy design. The sleek, eye-catching appearance adds a touch of elegance to my vanity.Using the C3 Aire 360 is incredibly easy, even for someone like me who isn't a hair styling expert. The kit comes with clear instructions and intuitive controls, making it a breeze to achieve salon-quality results at home. My hair has never looked better; it's super gorgeous and has a professional finish that I previously thought only a salon visit could provide.This blowout kit has truly become my best friend. With its impressive performance, I no longer feel the need to book expensive salon appointments. It's transformed my hair routine and has given me the freedom to style my hair to perfection whenever I want.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The T3 air styler might be my favorite from this category so far! My most used attachment is the drying concentrator, I notice my hair is way less frizzy and has more shine when using this to dry my hair vs a regular blow dryer. They really came through for us long haired girls with they curling attachments, they are longer and all my hair fits on the barrel effortlessly. I also love that the curling attachments are ceramic, using them to curl makes by beautiful curls so bouncy and voluminous, I looked like I just stepped out of the salon. T3 really thought of everything with this launch, they even included a chic bag (with pockets) to store everything in! This tool will be in my normal rotation now as I feel that itu2019s more gentle on my hair and love its versatility!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: *I used this on medium length straight hair.* I really like the curling attachment on this thing. It gave beautiful flowing curls that lasted for hours. Even the next day I was left with a nice little body wave, and I didnu2019t even use any holding spray or anything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: T3 products curl my hair quickly without needing excessive heat. Amazingly, my styles last a long time! Iu2019m thrilled with the Aire 360 tool. Whether my hair is 80% dry or completely dry, I can effortlessly create voluminous, flowing curls. The extra-long barrels simplify and speed up the styling process, making it even easier.

reviews.review_title: The best styling tool Iu2019ve ever tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this styling tool! I cannot believe the curls it creates with zero heat damage. I love how easy it was to work with from the curling attachment holding your hair on its own to how easily the attachments go on and off the base. Iu2019m definitely going to be using this product every hair wash day. Iu2019m so happy that I donu2019t have to go to the salon to get a blow out anymore. This product creates salon quality blow outs. I absolutely adore and think this product is definitely worth the hype. The product itself feels very luxurious and I love the pink on the product! Soooo cute itu2019s the perfect color, the perfect styling tool, and it comes with the cutest storage tote. The storage tote was very thoughtful so you can keep all the attachments in one place!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this curled my hair. I naturally have frizzy, curly hair and sometimes I want wavier, longer curls. The round brush along with the blower helps do the trick as itu2019s lightweight and easy to use. My hair didnu2019t break because it glides smoothly due to its design. This product is versatile and definitely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have curly hair and the way this straightens my hair is magical, leaves hair super shiny and soft, cute volume and bouncy curls, i have long hair and I styled my hair in an hour which is amazing, wont pull the hair or make it painful, its not heavy and wont sound loud, have great temperature which will give you the results youu2019re looking for, not extreme heat to provide a healthy blowout and the packaging and storage bag are just gorgeous, love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: T3 Aire 360 Ceramic Air Styler Blowout Kit features: Air technology that grabs hair to form bouncy curls without damage.  Two ceramic curling attachments.  Aire 360 base thatu2019s compatible with all Aire 360 attachments.  Drying concentrator for rapid drying.  Oval brush attachment.  Not to mention 3 heat and 3 speed settings. Swivel cord and vegan leather storage tote.   I can use the drying concentrator for a rapid dry while protecting your hairs moisture. Then follow with the oval brush on damp hair. And the curling attachments on finally dry hair. You donu2019t have to use all attachments. Each attachment is easy to assemble and use. Iu2019m not a professional anyone can use this.  I love this styler. Itu2019s all in one. Keeps my hair shiny, bouncy, and frizz free. My curls last an entire work day 6-6. Same goes for the volume. I love having bouncy curly hair now! Gifted by T3.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The T3 AireBrush Duo has revolutionized my hair styling routine. This innovative tool allows me to achieve salon-quality blowouts at home, thanks to its interchangeable brush design and precise heat settings. Whether I want sleek, straight hair or voluminous curls, the AireBrush Duo handles it all with ease. The ionic technology also helps reduce frizz and enhances shine, leaving my hair looking healthy and styled to perfection. Itu2019s a game-changer for anyone who wants professional results without stepping into a salon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was very much blown away by the full body waves I was able to achieve with this set. A definite pro that stands out to me is if you are prone to getting a shoulder or arm pain from a traditional curling iron, like me this is so much easier to use, because it just sucks your hair in place. The round brush attachment also does a great job lifting the roots. The travel bag is so lux and convenient with the pockets inside for storage. My only minor complaint is a few strands of your hair can get stuck where the brush head and t3 meet, so be careful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly an amazing styling tool! I absolutely love the assortment of the different attachments to create various styles with the same base. The hair dryer attachment gets my thick hair dry in less than 10 minutes which is amazing! To use the other attachments I wait until my hair is about 80% dry and then style. The waves are effortless and the blowout is so easy with the round brush. It saves so much time and itu2019s also less damaging since it only uses air! Such a genius tool! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this!! It made my hair look so nice and my curls stayed all day. I loved all the different tool heads it came with to give the perfect blowout. I will be using this every hair wash day! Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m impressed with this Blowout Kit so far because it includes all the attachments you could possibly need for a nice and sleek blowout look. The ceramic color looks really aesthetic alongside the leather bag it comes with. The oval brush is very grippy and glides into your hair for a fuller-looking style. It's really easy to attach and detach the different tools for styling, though I wish it wasn't as loud, but it's not a big deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have really hard to dry hair and it is think depending on heat setting I struggle with frizz and strainghters/curls not really holding unless at a very high temp but that also goes with damage. I was amazingly surprised with with hair tool and can vouch that it works wonders I have been truly obsessed with it & love the color as well. I is super easy to use. I do have layers and the oval brush can give you more of a round out end not so much blow out unless I just havenu2019t found the trick to it but over all love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t read about this product enough. It feels so luxurious and it makes your hair look like he just got a fresh blowout from a professional. Also the packaging is so beautiful. It feels amazing. Itu2019s such incredible quality. I canu2019t read, but itu2019s product enough. Thereu2019s no need to spend $600 on the more expensive version. This product is so luxurious and is incredible. Cannot recommend it enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great styler! Super easy to use, sleek and compact, and gives me blowout hair without the high cost. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a styler. This is well worth it in results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: T3 Aire 360 deserves more than five stars!   The tool arrived in a unique hexagon-shaped box that is too attractive to discard and will be used for storage. The included faux leather drawstring bag has designated areas inside to store each attachment and the tool itself.   T3 Aire 360 is well-made and very sturdy. Each attachment securely connects to the tool, making it feel like a single unit. The drying attachment has a unique shape, and it takes only about five minutes to go from soaking wet hair to damp hair ready for styling. The large oval brush takes my hair from damp and frizzy to dry and sleek in just a few passes. The short bristles gently grasp the hair, stretching curls while blowing it out. The curling attachments are super easy to use, and apart from dividing the hair into sections, they do most of the hard work.   Despite its power, the T3 Aire 360 is very quiet and doesn't produce any high-pitched whistling noises like some other styling tools or hair dryers. Blowing out my hair has always been a time-consuming task, but with the T3 Aire 360, it takes me no longer than 30 minutes to achieve a salon-quality blowout.

reviews.review_title: Where has T3 been all my life?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My T3 Aire 360 Blowout kit is everything!  I feel lucky to try this.  From the packaging to air technology, my hair and myself are blown away.  I appreciate how the machine itself isnu2019t too loud or noisy making this very tolerable to hear while using.  The base is very comfortable to grip, and doesnu2019t irritate my arm throughout its use time. Itu2019s an easy to control machine that allows me to do my entire head by myself.     I have a wavy and fine hair type that gets frizzy.   But I was able to get a salon finish blowout with lots of shine and body!   The drying concentrator helped take down my wet hair to a u2018moist enough and dried down levelu2019 that perfectly prepped my hair for its amazing finish.  I love how the air felt and sound coming out of this attachment.   Then I styled my hair with the oval brush that has amazing bristles gently polishing and styling each section of my hair.  I used the highest heat setting when using the brush. I used the curling attachments to create curtain bangs.  Just be careful with not touching the barrels because of how hot the ceramic gets on the barrels itself.  I never experienced that kind of hot and almost sticky like feeling on a curling barrel before.   Make sure you use the tip for controlling that attachment.  Overall, Iu2019m extremely pleased with my frizz free blowout.  I even love that someone on the streets assumed my hair was a wig.  I also canu2019t get over the detail work that went into the packaging to the vegan leather storage bag thatu2019s  also compartmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a GAME CHANGER even for my curly hair! I donu2019t have a system like this u2014 everything compact / all in oneu2026 it is so helpful and effective! I love love love everything t3 create but this has got to be one of the best! ud83cudf38ud83dudc95

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using air stylers for about 2 years and was so excited when t3 was releasing their own! I use their straightener and curler and knew the air wrap would be just as good. It can dry my long hair very fast and when I use the wrap barrel and some hair spray I get the BEST blowouts. It is also so pretty I love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This styler is amazing! I love the light pink color and everything feels well made. Itu2019s super easy to use, attachments are easy to put on and take off. I really like using the blow dryer and blow out brush attachment. Together they gave me hair that looks like I can out of a salon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received something in exchange for this post. You have no idea how excited I was for this product to arrive!! It is literally amazing. It is so comparable to the Dyson or Shark, but literally with no heat. I had to look up tutorials on how to use it, but I got the hang of it very quickly.

iu2019ve loved t3 products for a while so when i saw they came out with this i was super excited! the light pink color is beautiful and it works so well. my hair dries so quickly and holds volume beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the T3 Aire 360 Ceramic Aire Blow Out Kit, and I'm thoroughly impressed. This styler is a must-have for anyone aiming to achieve salon-quality blowouts and curls at home. The Aire 360 Technology is revolutionary, effortlessly gathering my hair to create soft, bouncy curls without any heat damage. The ceramic curling attachments deliver long-lasting, shiny results, which is a huge plus for my fine hair.  The custom-designed oval brush with SmoothGrip bristles and a ceramic surface makes smoothing and shaping a breeze. I noticed a significant reduction in frizz and an increase in shine after using it. The SoftAire drying concentrator is another fantastic feature, as it dries my hair quickly while maintaining its natural moisture.  Using the Aire 360 base is incredibly easy, thanks to its smart microchip for digital heat control and high-speed AireX motor. Itu2019s the fastest drying experience I've had, and the multiple heat and speed settings give me full control over my styling. The 9ft swivel cord is a thoughtful addition, allowing for easy maneuvering without any tangling.  Overall, the T3 Aire 360 Blow Out Kit is a fantastic investment for anyone who wants quick, easy, and gentle styling with stunning results.

reviews.review_title: I know I got it for free but it ROCKS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The T3 Aire 360 Ceramic Air Styler Blowout Kit is a game-changer! Its portability and ease of use are unmatched. It delivers bouncy, shiny curls that last for days, leaving hair frizz-free and looking salon-fresh. Perfect for on-the-go styling, I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is incredible itu2019s the first air wrap Iu2019ve ever used and Iu2019m so impressed! I have dry hair so I worry about frizz and heat damage but this was perfect and left my hair looking and feeling so soft!

I have fine thin hair and this worked amazingly on my hair! I also used it on my knees and she has very thick long hair and her hair look absolutely beautiful. Highly highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: PUT THIS TOOL IN YOUR CART RIGHT NOW!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have very long, heavy, 3A curly hair.  i was very apprehensive of this actually working with my hair and keeping the style. i used the concentrater to get my roots dryer, since my ends seem to dry way faster. this works well. i was shocked at how large of sections i could do with the curling wrap tool. pro tip to not get confused: the direction of the arrow is the way the arrow faces WHEN LOOKING IN THE MIRROR at your tool. this was hard for me to notice. This thing did my whole head of curls in 20 minutes. Mind that my hair was 90% dry when i started. i did have to mist water on my hair to get that crisp curl and bounciness if my hair was starting to dry too much before i got to the section. i am shocked and so impressed by this. i have A LOT of hair and this tool took my whole head from damp, frizz to shiny, bouncy curls. the curls lasted all day! i have curls even the next day somewhat. I AM SOLD ON THIS MIRACLE MACHINE!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: so i recently got my hands on the NEWW aire 360 air styler blowout kit which is a d00p of yk and let me just say, it's a game-changer for my hair game.  all i have to do is rough dry my hair till it's slightly damp, divide it into sections, and then let the magic happen with the curling attachments. the oval brush is amazing for smoothing and shaping u2013 it's like having my own personal stylist at home! and can we talk about the results? the curls last forever! okay, not forever, but they seriously stick around for a good while. plus, i love that it's gentle on my hair u2013 no heat damage here, folks.  oh, and let's not forget about the cool features like the cool shot that seals in shine and the storage tote for keeping everything organized. so convenient! overall, if you're looking for fast, easy styling that gives you big-time body and shine, this is it. trust me, your hair will thank you. from, a girly who is not very good at her hair haha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! This hair tool is unlike any other have ever tried. Itu2019s such a game changer because not only is it time efficient but it will give you the best blow out and curls ever. Iu2019m getting rid of all of my hair tools and replacing it with this. Not a want but a need!!! Itu2019s life changing!

Iu2019ve always wanted to try one on the hair curlers that wraps hair around the barrel by itself, so I was extremely excited when I got a chance to try T3. This is a hair tool with interchangeable attachments. It is a hairdryer, drying brush, and hair curler in one. It is very easy to change the attachments. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The T3 Aire 360 Ceramic Air Styler Blowout Kit is a game-changer in hair care, blending advanced technology with user-friendly design for salon-quality results at home. This sleek, lightweight styler features a powerful motor and ceramic-coated barrel, ensuring even heat distribution and minimizing damage while adding incredible shine and volume. With multiple heat and speed settings, it caters to all hair types and styling preferences, effortlessly transforming frizz into smooth, bouncy locks. The kit's thoughtful design, including interchangeable attachments and an ergonomic handle, makes it a joy to use, redefining at-home blowouts with elegance and efficiency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I AM SO OBSESSED!! Everything I need in a hair styler. Rounded brush, curling attachments and a blow dryer attachment. This is literally the only hair styler I need from now on. Curls are bouncy and beautiful and the blow dryer attachment dries my hair instantly!!!
